longDescription.p: Step into the universe of Alpha-Fox, your premier destination for cutting edge virtual services in Second Life. At the heart of our offerings is the Alteran Stargate Network (ASN), an advanced teleportation system connecting adventurers to countless destinations across the grid. Whether you're dialing up a Stargate to explore distant sims or integrating our robust APIs, we're here to elevate your Second Life experience with reliable, innovative tools.

Our dedicated team works tirelessly behind the scenes, refining systems to ensure seamless journeys because no one enjoys a gate stuck on the fritz! From swiftly handling server hiccups to rolling out exciting new updates, we're committed to keeping your adventures uninterrupted. But Alpha-Fox is more than just technology; it's a thriving community.

group.name: Novum Network
group.shortDescription: A new Gate network trying to improve visual fidelity founded in 2023.
group.longDescription: Novum Network brings together visionaries from across the digital landscape to collaborate on experimental design and community-driven projects. They set new standards for virtual identity through visual storytelling and avant-garde design patterns.

group.name: Vk Labs
group.shortDescription: Advanced interactive systems, stargate devices and RP ready builds.
group.longDescription: Vk Labs specializes in creating devices to fit all your Stargate needs from DHDs to advanced computers helping you manage your Stargate accesses. They also provide builds that you can either use for your own as your homebase or for roleplaying.

group.name: OS Labs
group.shortDescription: The OG Stargate creator that inspired a lot.
group.longDescription: OS Labs was the source of many great products back in Eternal Calm. They provide quality devices and flyable ships. Development has halted but their products are still amongst the favorites.

group.name: SGMU
group.shortDescription: One sim connecting the Gate networks and fans.
group.longDescription: The Stargate Multiverse Project is a collaborative Roleplay initiative on Second Life, dedicated to recreating the awe and wonder of the Stargate franchise within a multi-sim virtual environment. Join us as we step through the event horizon into a galaxy of intrigue, diplomacy, and discovery.
